title: She Blames Her Mom For Her Parents' Divorce?!
description:
Mallory’s parents are getting a divorce, and not only does she think they’re making a big mistake, but she also thinks that her mother is to blame.
When her parents told her and her brothers, they were in complete shock. To their knowledge, they had no idea that their parents were unhappy and to Mallory, this all just seems to be coming out of nowhere.
After doing some research on divorce and divorce at age 50 + Mallory is starting to wonder whether the divorce has something to do with hormonal changes her mom may be facing.
Mallory asked The Bert Show for advice from women her mom’s age on whether they have experienced divorce and if so, what was the cause.
